problem_text_cn: 如图,点A、B、C在⊙O上,AO∥BC,∠AOB=50°,则∠OAC的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, AO ∥ BC, ∠AOB = N_0, then the degree of ∠OAC is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵AO∥BC,∴∠OAC=∠ACB．
又∠AOB与∠ACB都是弧AB所对的角,∴∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=25°,∴∠OAC的度数是25°．
故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题利用了圆周角定理和两直线平行内错角相等求解,关键是先求出∠ACB的度数．
